case.state: Um... so, like, is the game starting yet?
I can't tell if that person is really far away or just really really tiny...
Oh my... It's an honor to stand in your presence, ~player~. I look forward to our game.
(Is this the strip poker place?)
Is this, like, the place where they play poker? I'm great at poker!
Um, is something about to start?
Oh, I'm sorry, I forgot to, like, introduce myself. I'm Ini Miney.
I was just, like, taking a nap. So, like, where am I?
Like, hi! Friends call me Ini! Not friends usually call me "that occult freak".
This could be a fun game! Who doesn't want to get a win under their belt? Or whatever clothing you guys are wearing.
Did everyone else, like, pay a cover charge to get in here or did I just give a random guy $200?
(A gun... the memories... guess I still have to play, though.)
That thing you rode in on, is that, like, one of those floor-cleaning dealies?
(I can't believe it! Why here! Why now!)
(What's she doing here! Does she remember me? Pleasepleaseplease don't!)
Well, if you're gonna do this, I'm gonna go smoke a fat blunt first...
Ah! I... I see... (I'll talk with her about that later.)
I love the beret! It's just the cutest thing, ohmygosh! Where did you get it?
Wait? Jin? I thought we were, like, playing poker?
(Who in the heck is that guy with the sunglasses? I have no idea. I should really get better with names)
(Am I the only one who saw those floating symbols? Please let it not be just me this time.)
(Who brings an SMG to poker? ...I guess she does. Asked and answered)
Not, like, another redhead with a camera!
A redhead, like, sporting a camera...
Is that, like, a vampire! Wicked cool! I've got so many questions!
O-oh... h-hey everybody. Nice to meet so m-many brand-new people.
Wait... "Occult Balls"? I don't know anything about balls, but if you want the occult, I'm your girl!
It's so shiny! Can I touch it? I reeeeally wanna touch it!
Oh! My! Gawd! You're so pretty! Who does your hair!
(Why did someone have to bring two pistols to strip poker?)
(I think that's one of those idols Ini was into. What was her name? ...I wish I'd paid more attention when she talked about them...)
Oh! My! Gawd! An actual ghost! I'm gonna write the greatest paper of all time!
(More cameras! Do they ever stop!)
Oh no... my vision's all messed up again. I'm seeing double...
It's so wonderful to see so many people here, but especially you, my little ~player~!
(Today is totally not my day...)
Wow! Like, everyone's got red hair here!
Like, wow! It's like a beret club in here!
Yay! We get to go to the beach! I love the beach!
Oh, um... who's bedroom is this? Like, are we intruding on something?
Question: Can we go in the pool? And, follow up question, do I have to get naked first?
Woooah... there's, like, a lot of purple in this room.
It's kinda breezy up here on the roof. Feels good on my skin.
Woooow! This place looks nice. Did it get a renovation or something?
Oh hey, it's you! Quick question: Why?
I certainly didn't expect you to show up here, Pheenie.
Is this how you always spend ~weekday~ nights, ~player~?
Only three? It looks like we could fit, like, two more people if we wanted to...
Oh good! With only us three, I have room to shuffle the deck! It'll take up most of the table space, though...
Oh... I expected more people to be here...
Cool. Looks like it's just us girls tonight.
Hello, boys! I, like, hope everyone plans on having a fun night together!
(Psst! You forgot clothes. I've done that too, but just go back and, like, put something on. Please.)
I'll take, like, ~cards~.
Woooow... ~cards~!
Can I have, like, ~cards~?
Um... ~cards~?
I'd like, like, ~cards~ cards!
6? No... um... 2? Like, how about... ~cards~?
Oh, um... no cards for me, thanks...
Nah, I'm good. No cards.
None of these are any good... so five.
Guess I'm gonna need a whole new hand.
Wow! These cards are, like, really good!
Woah... am I, like, gonna win this round?
Cards this good make me feel like an idol!
I'm going to be doing whatever the opposite of losing is!
Wooooah! Like, thanks dealer!
I have, like, a premonition that this is going to be a good hand!
Hey, ~player~? Can you, like, check these cards? I wanna know if they're good.
So, like, can you check if these cards are good, ~player~?
I don't, like, need precognition to tell I'm survivin' this round.
I don't see anyone beating this hand!
Hooray! I, like, get to last another round!
Yeah! No stress for me this round!
Yay! I needed a win in life!
Slowly climbing the step-ladder of success.
Like, what was in that brief case anyways? Are you a business lady or something?
Aw... I thought the idea was pretty good...
Like, best place to go sightseeing around here is Hakazura Temple. it's tooootally beautiful when it snows.
Alright, so I might've lied and told a few people I brushed my teeth this morning. But that's, like, it. Honest.
(Please don't remember me! Please don't remember me!)
That sounds like a tooootally good time, Mulan! I'm in!
Oh! This is an Om! It's connected to spirits and is sacred to many cultures.
Like, no thanks. Everyone says that when I get drunk I can go up to five "likes" a sentence.
Like, what's that? Sounds neat!
You gotta learn to just chill Shimi...
It ain't always about being first, Shimi. Unless, this is, like, an actual race.
Might wanna tone down the speed, Shimi. That's when you start, like, making mistakes.
I don't think I've, like, every seen anybody more excited than Shimi over there.
I mean, that's, like, how I've been playing, Vriska.
(Is that how you play? Well, Vriska is smarter than me, so she would know.)
ROY-AL FLUSH! ROY-AL FLUSH! ROY-AL FLUSH!
Royal flush! Where has this luck been the past couple years?
Is there, like, a second card swap?
Oh... these cards are pretty alright...
So, cutting the deck doesn't involve, like, a knife or anything, right?
My face might give it away, but can you, like, prove I have a bad hand?
I gave back that diamond with the low number, but diamonds are, like, a girl's best friend. Hmmm...
Just four cards left, and I'll have UNO!
Hmmm... go fish.
I'm, like, so glad I traded that card with only one A for this one with actual numbers on it.
You can usually tell your future with these types of cards, too.
Wait... why am I holding these cards again?
These are, like, nice cards they have here. Though they'd be cooler if they had blue backs.
Maybe this place should get a pianist or something for a little ambience?
You should be smart like me, ~player~! Go safe when other people have good hands. Maybe even just have a high card!
I'm trying to, like, organize these cards, but I can't seem to remember the numbers of the alphabet...
(I wonder why I, like, keep saying like in my thoughts... Maybe it's best not to think about that.)
Remembering all your names is kinda hard... why couldn't we all wear name tags or something?
(I wonder if anyone here can read my thoughts. If there is, I hope they like the song I've had stuck in my head for the past hour.)
Might as well get rid of cards randomly. If only there was, like, a song or something that could help with these choices.
So many more people used to get into occult studies... then they put those tiny warning labels on albums...
Like, what was in that brief case anyways? Are you a business lady or something?
Ooh! Futaba! Can you play something by the Gavinners?
Well, I thought the idea wasn't bad, but that's just me.
Like, best place to go sightseeing around here is Hakazura Temple. it's tooootally beautiful when it snows.
Alright, so I might've lied and told a few people I brushed my teeth this morning. But that's, like, it. Honest.
(Please don't remember me! Please don't remember me!)
That sounds like a tooootally good time, Mulan! I'm in!
Oh! This is an Om! It's connected to spirits and is sacred to many cultures.
Like, no thanks. Everyone says that when I get drunk I can go up to five "likes" a sentence.
Like, what's that? Sounds neat!
I mean, that's, like, how I've been playing, Vriska.
(Is that how you play? Well, Vriska is smarter than me, so she would know.)
Like... dang it... bad draw.
It's too bad for, like, whoever's gonna lose.
I think it might, like, be my turn to eat some humble pie...
Darn... darn... and like... darn.
It might be time for this hand to look into reincarnation.
This hand is, like, worse than my skin after I eat sesame seeds.
This feels like a near death experience...
Maybe I was, like, a better poker player in a past life.
This is, like, a totally terrible situation!
Stupid little cards.
I guess I'm going to do that thing that happens when you don't win.
Like, this is totally bringing me down...
Aw... it's, like, fine though... I'm used to losing...
It all comes crashing down, like a house of... something.
Like, what was in that brief case anyways? Are you a business lady or something?
Ooh! Futaba! Can you play something by the Gavinners?
I dunno. I might, like, start leaving notes so I stop forgetting things.
Like, best place to go sightseeing around here is Hakazura Temple. it's tooootally beautiful when it snows.
Alright, so I might've lied and told a few people I brushed my teeth this morning. But that's, like, it. Honest.
(Please don't remember me! Please don't remember me!)
That sounds like a tooootally good time, Mulan! I'm in!
Oh! This is an Om! It's connected to spirits and is sacred to many cultures.
Like, no thanks. Everyone says that when I get drunk I can go up to five "likes" a sentence.
Like, what's that? Sounds neat!
I mean, that's, like, how I've been playing, Vriska.
(Is that how you play? Well, Vriska is smarter than me, so she would know.)
Oh boy... I hope you find these mysterious individuals... whoever they are...
That's a good idea. It'll keep you limber so you can hold your cards better!
Shhhh... be quiet... I think someone brought a bee with them...
Be quiet, I might be hearing a bee... but only one, meaning that someone didn't bring enough to share...
Shhhh... I think I'm hearing a buzzing that's different from the one I usually hear in my head.
Sorry. I've never seen you before? Did we, like, go to summer camp together or something?
I like the butterfly motif, Jolyne. It's totally pretty.
It's, like, a space woman. That's suuuuper cool. What's space like?
It's, like, cool if you don't wanna, but it's definitely worked in the past...
Yeah... that's like, cool... I don't know wh-what I was so nervous about...
I was probably, like, over reacting there... (The problem is that her hands are where her fingers are, and her fingers are the things that make the gun do that thing that guns do.)
Oh... um... don't worry about it, Revy. I'm doing j-just fine...
Flame tribe? Could you, like, keep the flames down? I... don't want my foundation to be messed up!
Um... whaaaat... Like, I have no idea what I was talking about. I tooootally heard that on that show, Black's Anatomy...
Sorry. Nevermind, dumb ol' me. I'm, like, whacked out from studying last night, is all.
Wait! Did anyone else just see giant floating words? It wasn't just me, was it?
You don't think we can skip the whole strip thing, so I can talk to the ghost? No? Oh well...
Why thank you, Futaba. Squids are the angels of the ocean.
You know, Jura, you're pretty great, too!
I have, like, no idea what you're talking about, Meia. I'm just not all that smart or focused is all...
I hope not, I like my possessions! Specifically, when I possess them!
Hey! I may be dumb and stupid and not that smart and a little unfocused and ditsy...
I, like, can't believe that I'm going to be playing the game with an actual idol! My tea leaves said this would happen!
Aw, don't mind it, Sei. Yeah, my nose is a little stuffed up, but I can still breathe through my mouth like normal!
It's okay ~player~, I still love you!
Whaaaaaaa!!!
Aw phooey... at least I'm still, like, winning or something.
I'm actually, like, kinda still good at this game.
It was those two non-matching cards that brought me down, wasn't it?
I thought I had a three of a kind? OH! You're just being silly, right? ...Right?
But, like... I had two pair...
Am I, like, not supposed to have pairs? I lost with two of them...
Oh... um... this is like... what's the word I'm thinking of? Bad...
This game is, like, a total bore. Isn't someone supposed to be stripping? ...Oh...
It was those two non-matching cards that brought me down, wasn't it?
I thought I had a three of a kind? OH! You're just being silly, right? ...Right?
But, like... I had two pair...
Am I, like, not supposed to have pairs? I lost with two of them...
Oh, I'm sorry, did I forget to, like, introduce myself? I'm Ini.
These bracelets, like, allow me to, like, speak with the dead.
Wait... did I lose?
It's alright, I can take a hint. Unless you've got another two or three.
Not again! It can't, like, end like this!
Another string of bad luck...
Too many unfortunate events... so close together...
It was those two non-matching cards that brought me down, wasn't it?
I thought I had a three of a kind? OH! You're just being silly, right? ...Right?
But, like... I had two pair...
Am I, like, not supposed to have pairs? I lost with two of them...
Aw well... bye bye bracelets.
Should I be removing both bracelets? They don't really match...
Wait... should I strip both bracelets 'cause they're, like, the same type thing or strip only one 'cause their different?
Could be worse. People could call you a kid and a squid.
Well, I know a little bit about them. Like, they're invisible to most people and have neat powers. Why do you ask, Jolyne?
It's so nice having people like you, Jura. We're from two different worlds, but you're already, like, striking up conversation.
That's cool. Lemme just get these little things off while you do... that, Miko.
It's totally cool. I suck at names too, um... Quarter? No? Penny? Penny!
...And dumb and forgetful and kinda hungry and could use a nap...
Like, I'm a parapsychology major up at Ivy University. Real spooky stuff. Ghosts, ESP, and the hidden dimension your other sock goes to when you put them in the dryer.
C'mon, Sei. I think we both, like, know the answer to that one...
Yep, that's me. I, like, can't believe you guys don't have gingers anymore!
Of course. It's not as if I needed my parasol. Allow me to place it aside.
Wait... no they don't... do they?
Wait... I won these in, like, a cereal box.
Whoa... are you losing already, ~name~?
It's seriously okay, ~name~, we all lose sometimes.
Aww, but I like ~name~. He doesn't shove a badge in your face every time you meet.
Guess it's your turn, ~name~.
Just remember to remove your clothing. People didn't, like, appreciate it when I mixed that up.
If you want, ~name~, I can, like, close my eyes.
If it'll, like, make you feel better, ~name~, I'll close my eyes.
Maybe you should have brought a medium's robe too. They're very comfy.
I see what ~name~ is going for, a fake-out to make us think he's worse than he is! Smart.
I can't, like, believe I made it through that round! Isn't this exciting, ~name~?
Corrin, you seem like the kind of guy to appreciate the cute things in life.
I didn't think you'd be the type to take a few glances at a Dumb Girl Stripping, Chef.
I don't know why, but you seem like the type of person to want a tarot card reading. I'll just use these playing cards and...
I've, like, never felt so impassioned by someone! Thanks, whatever your name is!
Wow! Kamina really makes me believe in the me who believes in myself...
Look at those cheekbones. You could, like, cut yourself on those.
So, like, I heard you used to be an athlete. That's pretty cool.
Don't let it be your shirt... I like that shirt...
Pick a good one this time, Ryuji! I'm not as dumb as I look and I think you are, too.
Aw... and I really think you could have won, too.
Oh... um... thanks for the win, ~name~.
We're all meant to, like, make mistakes.
Let's see... you don't have any chips or anything, so what could you bet instead?
Oh! I didn't see you there! ...'Cause of, like... the eyes thing.
Well, if they, like, lose it, then you can just go and buy it again!
Hmmm... there might be some dark spirits here... or I'm hungry again.
The look on your face says more than your, like, words ever could.
I hope, like, nobody lawyered you into doing this.
You can't, like, keep losing like this.
Twice in a row? Really?
Wow! Was that twice in a row or did I just forget about another loss in between?
Everyone else is never going to lose at this rate...
Are your eyes, like, purple? Is that natural?
Eh? Are those, like, contacts, ~player~?
Ah! I don't know any ~name~. Never heard of her...
I knew I shoulda learned your name first.
I hope you're ready to strip, ~name~.
So, what does the loser have to do again?
Maybe next time you could just show up naked so that you don't have to strip at all!
~name~ has to strip? I'm so happy in a sad way...
If we, like, take the total happiness I gained and take away how upset you just got... oh... I wish I was better at math...
Looks like... um... uh... like, um... whatsername... has to strip.
Did you forget the part where you have to win the round? 'Cause I've done that too.
Gawd... that could've been me...
Now... ~name~ has to do... something... What was it again?
It's "almost" time for me to strip, but that means it's not time for me to strip yet!
Like, again? Really?
You know when you stack the deck you're supposed to, like, make it so that you win, right?
Good thing they already, like, set up a pile for your clothes.
Like, I am digging your positive attitude, ~name~!
Wow! There's no holding you back!
Ha ha ha! You, like, actually make this game kinda fun, ~name~!
I, like, tooootally thought I was done for back there...
Huh? I didn't lose? Are you sure?
Thank you, ~name~! I didn't have anything back there!
It's still weird playing the game with what's basically an astral projection.
Wow! Playing strip poker with an idol! Like, an actual one this time!
I mean, I like Alpha's music, but it isn't The Gavinners.
You're a model aren't you, Ami?
As a parapsychology major myself, it's so nice to see another, like, woman of science.
Say... like, what's in that giant syringe, anyways?
Wow! Your make up is soooo well done!
You, like, really laugh a lot... Like, a lot, a lot...

There're so many things you could take off... gloves, boots, those black whatevers, probably have some hair ties in your braids... Can my bracelets be used as hair ties? Do I have hair ties at home? Do I have food at home? I'm kinda hungry. There was that French restaurant nearby, maybe that's good...
Wait! You get to, like, work with Pegasi every day!
What's, like, making those cube whatever's, like, float and junk?
I think you said that you were doing research of something?
HEY, FLORINA! THERE'S A BEE ON YOUR TUNIC!
HEEEEEEEEY! THERE'S A BEEEEEEEEE!
Florina! There's, like, a bee on your tunic!
Ah ha! I, like, knew that buzzing was different than the one that I usually hear!
Guess you have to strip, Franziska... (Ack! She totally remembers!)
I'm telling you, Franziska, I'm just, like, a college student. I don't know anything about anything.
(Think fast, Mimi...) Wait, I do remember a von Karma!
Hey! I know you have to strip and everything, but watch where you point that crop thingy!
Like, keep it up, Hanako! You're doing great!
Don't, like, be nervous, Hanako! We're all here for you!
Wow! You're really starting to open up, Hanako. Good for you!
Oh! A clown! Just like at the Berry Big Circus!
Y'know, I think my favorite clown would be Moe from the Berry Big Circus. He just had the funniest jokes!
Why are you so tall? You better not secretly have a small hat on your head where I can't see it!
You know, you kinda remind me of my mom...
Oh wow! You're on the internet! You must be so smart!
I guess I don't know about that much about the internet? What do you, like, even do on the internet?
Actually, in America, we don't say, "It's Kyu's turn to strip"...
Like, bless you.
Bless you. If you need to, like, blow your nose then I'd gladly lend you ~player~'s clothes.
She's switching back! I'm gonna write the best paper of multiple personalities, like, ever.
I'm, like, totally flattered and everything, but I'd rather you not take my picture during this game, Mahiru.
I really like your make-up. It suits you so well!
Nope. Not me. I've, like, never seen you before in my life.
Wait! I remember now. Fey, as in the Fey family of spirit channelers. Your sister Maya is, like, a total idol in my field.
Would you look at that... Mia lost again. What a shame.
Oh? Are we all out of pointless accessories, Mia? Do you have to, like, actually lose something important?
I'd probably want to stop worrying about me, Mia. You seem to have more... pressing matters to attend to.
I don't know if you were, like, expecting some big reveal from me, Mia. But I think everyone is expecting a big reveal from you.
Ah! Consort. That's one of those people who are really flexible and can, like, fit in small boxes, right?
I don't know about this girl. There are probably, like, bad spirits or something in her.
Oh my gawd! You're soooo cute!
I know you're like an adult and whatever, but you're just too cute.
So, do you, like, have a special fairy to call your own, Navi?
Wooooah! Are you, like, a god?
You... kinda remind me of someone. Hmmm... Nah, I'm, like, probably imagining things.
So, like, what do you do for a living, Penny?
So, like, what'll it be first? Shoes? Belt? Hairclip?
I gotta say, I'm not really all that familiar with combat. Like, what kind of weapon do you even use, Rinkah?
So, like, Rinkah, you wouldn't happen know some people who know divination? Would you?
What's a Senketsu? Why are we yelling?
Sayori! I, like, admire how upbeat and perky you are it's really super cool!
Keep on going, Sayori! You're in this 'til the end!
Are you some kinda magic person or something? You seem pretty handy with those cards.
Wait... Sheena's supposed to be like ninja or something, right?
Aw, don't worry too much, Sheena. Happens to me all the time.
So, Spooky, can you, like, remember anything from before you died?
Mph... media types...
Who even, like, pays for these streams? I thought there was other stuff, games and videos, that were totally free?
Actually, thinking on it... I don't really know all that much about the internet.
Media types... all they do is turn people into demons.
We don't, like, have to exercise while we do this? 'Cause I just woke up from a nap.
Okay, okay... questions for a vampire... um...
Something wrong? Are you more of an indoors person?
I guess you're not all that used to being outside, are you, ~name~?
Next game should be indoors. For ~name~'s sake.
Getting a tan for the first time, ~name~? Trust me, it ain't cheap otherwise.
For you, the day you had to strip was one of the worst days of your life...
Oh no... I'm seeing double again...
Is this a tie? That's, like, totally bogus.
Oh! You're like that dentist, right?
Wow! I can't believe I'm watching Mr. Smith, Esquire, strip!
That's, like, a total bummer.
I don't really, like, recognize your face, but maybe I'll recognize your body better!
Oh yeeeeah! I forgot the guys have to, like, strip too!
(Psst! The secret is to take off small stuff first. Pretty smart, right?)
This is, like, great and all, but when do we start getting money?
He lost? Well, that's Mr. Smith, Esquire for you...
You feelin' okay? You look a little red.
You're, um... Mr. Smith, Esquire, right? Yeah, that sounds about right to me.
Luck is just, like, not on your side tonight.
Did I doze off? I, like, thought you just stripped?
I guess you're a bad luck charm, ~player~.
I'm, like, trying to avoid bad luck right now, so I'm going to take one biiiig step away from you, ~player~.
I guess I probably couldn't jump and touch the top of your head, but you can't touch the top of my head 'cause of my hat.
Do I, like, still need to complain about small items when they're bigger because of his size?
You lost with a... um... straaiii... no? Um... a fluuu... no? A paaii... a pair? Ooh, sorry about that.
Do I, like, remember the rules wrong or shouldn't a pair win you most rounds?
Just missed out, huh?
I'm tooootally sure that you'll have an even better hand next round.
Too bad. Though even a dummy like me knows that a flush, with all the same colors, beats your pair.
It, like, totally sucks that you lost, ~player~. At least you aren't complaining that you lost with a pair to a flush like the people even dumber than me!
Your ~clothing~? I have, like, no idea what you're talking about...
There's no reason to stop now!
You're really getting into the swing of things, ~name~!
Losing is, like, heavy. Unlike your ~clothing~.
I left my sheets on my bed all ready for my next nap, just in case something like this happened.
I'm gonna be honest, I have no idea what's going on right now.
So, aren't bears, like, suuuuper cute!
I guess what I'm trying to say is that I can see the headlines now...
They look, like, totally cool and shiny, too!
I keep forgetting how many people come here armed... for some reason...
Hmm... let's see... a queen... a king... and a star...
He's so... manly. Looks like he's never given things a second thought...
Wow! A real angel! I was, like, wondering if you could read my paper on angelic imagery in paranormal circumstances?
I actually have a paper on angelic imagery in paranormal circumstances. Could you, like, give it a quick read, Pit?
Good thinking, not standing on your leg again. It's, like, your best option.
It's only fair... isn't it... ~name~?
I've waited a whole year for an imported car. I can wait a little longer.
If you keep this up, I'll just go back to my nap.
You can't just do that! Why does no one, like, take me seriously!
Like, I haven't been this disappointed since it turned out that one detective wasn't actually psychic.
Maybe we should, like, order some food so you can get back that weight you just lost?
Oh? Do we, like, get breaks for stripping items that matter?
Oh! But if you ever, like, see a bear, you just lie down, and everything will turn out okay!
"Local Eyes DGS".
Can you, like, turn your sword off? It's getting kinda bright in here.
That, like, doesn't matter. I'll appreciate it anyways.
For, like, a rough translation... your relationship with a masculine figure shall make you, like, ascend to a higher consciousness.
...I like that quality.
Yeah! The swelling's probably gone... nevermind.
Your loss has been, like, totally helpful for me!
Is there any anesthesia in your clothes? 'Cause they're putting me to sleep...
...Huh? Oh! Stripping! Wait... um... uh... You're going to strip your ~clothing~, ~name~?
For me? It's not much of a gift, but as long as you kept the receipt...
I should have probably worn more accessories myself...
Maybe I should, like, go back to my nap instead...
Hmmm... not the best looking. Like, maybe you should bring some stuff that would be cool enough to hang from a rearview mirror.
It doesn't look like we would have enough people for a chant...
I know you're, like, trying to win, but don't nod off, now.
Hold on. I wanna guess what you're, like, taking off. Hmmm...
Oh wow! Your hair is, like, suuuuper pretty!
I'm, like, totally jealous of how good your hair looks, ~name~!
You are so rockin' that hairstyle, ~name~!
That natural brunette look actually, like, really works for you, ~name~.
So, like, can I touch your hair, ~name~? It looks so pretty!
It looks like ~name~ is dealing with this quite well.
I can feel your confident energy, ~name~.
I guess it's, like, natural to be confident. You aren't taking off all that much.
Honestly, I don't think that your hair, like, works for you. You should consider dyeing.
